pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhaddaṃ kāpilāniṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭheti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.4: “ayaṃ maṃ, ayye, bhikkhunī sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭheti, imissāhaṃ cīvaraṃ dassāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.5: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.6: “ahaṃ kirāyye, ayyaṃ na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhemi, na kira me ayyā cīvaraṃ dassatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:1.15: “Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
